room_title: Escape room "Curse of the Mummy" by St. Louis Escape in St. Louis
review: We tried the Mummy room and made it out with two minutes to spare. You can tell a lot of effort goes into planning these. It was really cool. Loved the special effects.

room_title: Escape room "Curse of the Mummy" by St. Louis Escape in St. Louis
review: We did the Mummy escape room and it was amazing! We have done other escape rooms and they do not compare to this - lasers, animatronics, riddles, etc. so much fun!

room_title: Escape room "Curse of the Mummy" by St. Louis Escape in St. Louis
review: We had a great time! We had a group of 4 in the mummy room and luckily scored the room to ourselves! We finished the room in 55 minutes! Chris was great and super friendly! Plus the lobby is great! They have a good amount of games in there and we were able to hang around and play them for a while. Definitely want to go back for the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Curse of the Mummy" by St. Louis Escape in St. Louis
review: Great fun for adults, teenagers, and kids alike. We challenged the Mummy's Tumb and escaped the curse! Looking forward to our next challenge at the St Louis Escape.

room_title: Escape room "Curse of the Mummy" by St. Louis Escape in St. Louis
review: We've been to a lot of escape rooms and the Mummy Escape has to be the best looking room we've seen. I took my wife and three kids and we had a great time. We escaped with 12 minutes to spare. We recommend it.
